comment._content: Hillquist is probably photographed here in connection with his testimony at the Walsh Commission hearings (Commission on Industrial Relations) on February 4, 1915 at the Metropolitan Building in New York. query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=990CE1D81538E633A...
